front.title: Using Domain Name Services for Source Specific Multicast

abstract.t: One of the obstacles in implementing any version of Multicast is creating a method of advertising what is being 'broadcast' on any particular 'channel'. This document defines a method for using the existing Domain Name Service (DNS)[RFC1034, RFC1035] infrastructure to assist in advertising Source-Specific Multicast [SSM] 'channels' (S,G pairs).
